4133.verse: وَتَرَى|And you will see|127|134|5095$ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ|the Angels|97|111|3047$حَآفِّينَ|surrounding|96|110|15054$مِنْ|[from]|61|75|53$حَوْلِ|around|67|81|15055$ٱلْعَرْشِ|the Throne|93|107|6451$يُسَبِّحُونَ|glorifying|101|108|11749$بِحَمْدِ|(the) praise|98|118|9865$رَبِّهِمْ‌ۖ|(of) their Lord.|118|159|54$وَقُضِىَ|And (will) be judged|152|193|8194$بَيْنَهُم|between them|115|156|1056$بِٱلْحَقِّ|in truth,|78|98|692$وَقِيلَ|and it will be said,|140|157|3478$ٱلْحَمْدُ|`All praise be|108|141|5$لِلَّهِ|to Allah,|75|108|6$رَبِّ|(the) Lord|87|120|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.`|132|149|8$

4135.verse: تَنزِيلُ|(The) revelation|127|135|13868$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(of) the Book|108|124|811$مِنَ|(is) from|76|92|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|69|606$ٱلْعَزِيزِ|the All-Mighty,|118|134|3257$ٱلْعَلِيمِ|the All-Knower.|122|130|5868$

4136.verse: غَافِرِ|(The) Forgiver|115|131|15057$ٱلذَّنۢبِ|(of) the sin,|100|132|15058$وَقَابِلِ|and (the) Acceptor|148|180|15059$ٱلتَّوْبِ|(of) [the] repentance,|169|200|15060$شَدِيدِ|severe|67|83|15061$ٱلْعِقَابِ|(in) the punishment,|155|165|1746$ذِى ٱلطَّوْلِۖ|Owner (of) the abundance.|201|220|15062$لَآ|(There is) no|106|125|30$إِلَـٰهَ|god|53|72|2266$إِلَّا|except|65|84|86$هُوَۖ|Him;|49|59|298$إِلَيْهِ|to Him,|67|300|296$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|(is) the final return.|151|384|1162$

4138.verse: كَذَّبَتْ|Denied|75|88|12122$قَبْلَهُمْ|before them|100|126|11274$قَوْمُ|(the) people|102|128|6840$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh|75|101|4641$وَٱلْأَحْزَابُ|and the factions|129|155|15065$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْۖ|after them,|116|129|2256$وَهَمَّتْ|and plotted|96|104|15066$كُلُّ|every|57|74|575$أُمَّةِۭ|nation|61|78|3159$بِرَسُولِهِمْ|against their Messenger,|183|200|15067$لِيَأْخُذُوهُۖ|to seize him,|104|121|15068$وَجَـٰدَلُواْ|and they disputed|140|148|15069$بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ|by falsehood|104|110|437$لِيُدْحِضُواْ|to refute|111|124|10856$بِهِ|thereby|71|84|204$ٱلْحَقَّ|the truth.|85|98|436$فَأَخَذْتُهُمْۖ|So I seized them.|136|149|15070$فَكَيْفَ|Then how|85|98|2727$كَانَ|was|57|63|913$عِقَابِ|My penalty?|100|100|9473$

4139.verse: وَكَذَٲلِكَ|And thus|91|104|1273$حَقَّتْ|has been justified|137|164|8141$كَلِمَتُ|(the) Word|93|120|5968$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|139|1322$عَلَى|against|68|95|52$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|102|20$كَفَرُوٓاْ|disbelieved|92|137|59$أَنَّهُمْ|that they|83|173|461$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are) companions|135|225|409$ٱلنَّارِ|(of) the Fire.|106|151|410$

4140.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|109|20$يَحْمِلُونَ|bear|96|130|5529$ٱلْعَرْشَ|the Throne|93|127|15071$وَمَنْ|and those|86|120|1012$حَوْلَهُۥ|around it|85|119|10210$يُسَبِّحُونَ|glorify|101|118|11749$بِحَمْدِ|(the) praises|105|113|9865$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord|113|128|54$وَيُؤْمِنُونَ|and believe|108|123|15072$بِهِۦ|in Him|59|74|204$وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ|and ask forgiveness|151|166|15073$لِلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|120|750$ءَامَنُواْ|believe,|82|100|84$رَبَّنَا|`Our Lord!|89|126|1167$وَسِعْتَ|You encompass|123|160|15074$كُلَّ|all|49|86|2487$شَىْءٍ|things|69|106|186$رَّحْمَةً|(by Your) Mercy|128|146|2636$وَعِلْمًا|and knowledge,|123|142|8901$فَٱغْفِرْ|so forgive|85|123|2689$لِلَّذِينَ|those who|89|127|750$تَابُواْ|repent|64|102|1397$وَٱتَّبَعُواْ|and follow|91|129|945$سَبِيلَكَ|Your Way|84|103|15075$وَقِهِمْ|and save them (from)|164|229|15076$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|264|1786$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(of) the Hellfire.|126|191|1107$

4133.verse: And you will see the angels surrounding the Throne, exalting [Allah] with praise of their Lord. And it will be judged between them in truth, and it will be said, "[All] praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds."

4135.verse: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.

4136.verse: The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance. There is no deity except Him; to Him is the destination.

4137.verse: No one disputes concerning the signs of Allah except those who disbelieve, so be not deceived by their [uninhibited] movement throughout the land.

4138.verse: The people of Noah denied before them and the [disbelieving] factions after them, and every nation intended [a plot] for their messenger to seize him, and they disputed by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth. So I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.

4139.verse: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire.

4140.verse: Those [angels] who carry the Throne and those around it exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who have believed, [saying], "Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.
